name: Clip Clop (clayton peterson)
description:
Clip clop is now feature complete, and is in the beta testing phase of its development. It is free to play. Once fully tested, it will be shipped off to Apple's app store. Tell your friends! Tell your mom & dad!

If you enjoy it, or have any feedback/suggestions/bugs/ideas, email me! tell me what you think! :D

email: clayton.peterson@maine.edu
